list.title: 删除DNS资源记录
list.desc:
curl --location --request DELETE '{dns-api-host}/resource-record/60a241d9b63d09d5b6f0b5bd' 

{
    "code": 0,
    "msg": "成功",
    "data": {}
}

list.title: 获取配置项
list.desc:
curl --location --request GET '{dns-api-host}/resource-records/config'

{
    "code": 0,
    "msg": "成功",
    "data": {
        "min_ttl": 60,
        "max_ttl": 86400,
        "min_priority": 0,
        "max_priority": 65535
    }
}
list.res_body: {"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","properties":{"code":{"type":"number"},"msg":{"type":"string"},"data":{"type":"object","properties":{"min_ttl":{"type":"number","description":"最短缓存时间(秒)"},"max_ttl":{"type":"number","description":"最长缓存时间(秒)"},"min_priority":{"type":"number","description":"最低权重值"},"max_priority":{"type":"number","description":"最高权重值"}},"required":["min_ttl","max_ttl","min_priority","max_priority"]}},"required":["code","msg","data"]}

list.title: 解析（无需对接）
list.desc:
curl --location --request GET '{dns-api-host}/resolve?name=foreverland.xyz&type=1'

{
    "code": 0,
    "msg": "成功",
    "data": {
        "list": [
            {
                "name": "@",
                "domain": "foreverland.xyz",
                "value": "8.8.8.8",
                "ttl": 60
            }
        ]
    }
}

list.title: 资源记录冲突检查
list.desc:
该为创建和修改的前置检查接口

curl --location --request GET '{dns-api-host}/resource-records/conflict?name=@&type=CNAME&domain=foreverland.xyz'

{
    "code": 0,
    "msg": "成功",
    "data": {
        "has_conflict": true,
        "list": [
            {
                "id": "60a74975c11f8dbc3aae11c9",
                "domain": "foreverland.xyz",
                "name": "@",
                "type": "A"
            }
        ]
    }
}
list.res_body: {"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","properties":{"code":{"type":"number"},"msg":{"type":"string"},"data":{"type":"object","properties":{"has_conflict":{"type":"boolean","description":"有无冲突"},"list":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"ID"},"domain":{"type":"string","description":"域名"},"name":{"type":"string","description":"名称"},"type":{"type":"string","description":"类型"}}},"description":"冲突记录的列表"}},"required":["has_conflict","list"]}}}

list.title: 修改DNS资源记录
list.desc:
参数规则参考创建接口

curl --location --request PUT '{dns-api-host}/resource-record/60a241d9b63d09d5b6f0b5bd' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data-raw '{
    "domain": "foreverland.xyz",
    "name": "@",
    "type": "A",
    "value": "8.8.4.4",
    "ttl": 600,
    "priorty": 10
}'

{
    "code": 0,
    "msg": "成功",
    "data": {}
}
list.markdown:
#### 参数规则参考创建接口

``` curl
curl --location --request PUT '{dns-api-host}/resource-record/60a241d9b63d09d5b6f0b5bd' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data-raw '{
    "domain": "foreverland.xyz",
    "name": "@",
    "type": "A",
    "value": "8.8.4.4",
    "ttl": 600,
    "priorty": 10
}'
```

``` json
{
    "code": 0,
    "msg": "成功",
    "data": {}
}
```
list.req_body_other: {"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","properties":{"domain":{"type":"string","description":"域名"},"name":{"type":"string","description":"名称"},"type":{"type":"string","description":"类型"},"value":{"type":"object","properties":{},"description":"值"},"ttl":{"type":"number","description":"缓存时间(秒)"},"priorty":{"type":"number","description":"优先级"}},"required":["domain","name","type","value","ttl"]}

list.title: 创建DNS资源记录
list.desc:
请求参数 name

  • 参数验证规则
    字符串完全匹配 @ 或者 *****
    *只允许在首位、和"*"后面只允许跟"."
    值不能以\“."、\“-"开头或结尾 主机记录（RR）值不能以"符号"单独存在。 主机记录（RR）值不能有连续的"."。 .分割的每个字符串长度不能超过63字符
    其他可用字符a-z、A-Z、0-9、'-' 、'_' 、'.'
  • 剔除掉 *.和@和*以后可使用正则进行验证
^([a-zA-Z0-9_]{1}[a-zA-Z0-9_-]{0,62}){1}(\\.[a-zA-Z0-9_]{1}[a-zA-Z0-9_-]{0,62})*[\\._]?$

请求参数 value

  • value是必填的可变参数 跟随type变化
记录类型 值类型 值
A String IPV4 Address
AAAA String IPV6 Address
CNAME String 域名
MX String 域名
TXT String 长度最大为512位的文本
SRV Object {
"port": 5050,
"weight": 10,
"target": "foreverland.xyz"
}		 port 端口号 uint16
weight 权重 uint16
target 目标地址 域名
CAA Object {
"flags": 0,
"tag": "issue"
"value": ""example.com""
}		 flags 认证机构限制标志 值为0或128
tag 证书属性标签 ^[a-z0-9]{1,15}$ 
value 证书颁发机构域名、策略违规报告邮件地址等信息 例 "example.com" / "ca.example.com" / "mailto:mailto:admin@example.com" 验证规则: ^"[0-9a-zA-Z*-_~=:;.@+/! ^?]{1,235}"$		 
curl --location --request POST '{dns-api-host}/resource-records' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data-raw '{
    "domain": "foreverland.xyz",
    "name": "@",
    "type": "A",
    "value": "8.8.8.8",
    "ttl": 60,
    "priorty": 10
}'

{
    "code": 0,
    "msg": "成功",
    "data": {
        "id": "60a230ace65f30eeb2c497a8"
    }
}
list.markdown:
#### 请求参数 name * 参数验证规则 字符串完全匹配 **@** 或者 \*\*\*\*\* \*只允许在首位、和"\*"后面只允许跟"\." 值不能以\“."、\“-"开头或结尾 主机记录（RR）值不能以"符号"单独存在。 主机记录（RR）值不能有连续的"."。 .分割的每个字符串长度不能超过63字符 其他可用字符a-z、A-Z、0-9、'-' 、'_' 、'.' * 剔除掉 \*\.和@和\*以后可使用正则进行验证 ``` ^([a-zA-Z0-9_]{1}[a-zA-Z0-9_-]{0,62}){1}(\\.[a-zA-Z0-9_]{1}[a-zA-Z0-9_-]{0,62})*[\\._]?$ ``` #### 请求参数 value * value是必填的可变参数 跟随type变化 | 记录类型 | 值类型 | 值 | | :--- | --- | --- | | A | String | IPV4 Address | | AAAA | String | IPV6 Address | | CNAME | String | 域名 | | MX | String | 域名 | | TXT | String | 长度最大为512位的文本 | | SRV | Object {
"port": 5050,
"weight": 10,
"target": "foreverland.xyz"
} | port 端口号 uint16
weight 权重 uint16
target 目标地址 域名 | | CAA | Object {
"flags": 0,
"tag": "issue"
"value": ""example.com""
} | flags 认证机构限制标志 值为0或128
tag 证书属性标签 ^[a-z0-9]{1,15}$ 
value 证书颁发机构域名、策略违规报告邮件地址等信息 例 "example.com" / "ca.example.com" / "mailto:mailto:admin@example.com" 验证规则: ^"[0-9a-zA-Z*-_~=:;.@+/! ^?]{1,235}"$ | ``` curl curl --location --request POST '{dns-api-host}/resource-records' \ --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \ --data-raw '{ "domain": "foreverland.xyz", "name": "@", "type": "A", "value": "8.8.8.8", "ttl": 60, "priorty": 10 }' ``` ``` json { "code": 0, "msg": "成功", "data": { "id": "60a230ace65f30eeb2c497a8" } } ```
list.req_body_other: {"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","description":"名称 @ * subdomain"},"type":{"type":"string","description":"类型 目前支持(A,AAAA, CNAME, MX, TXT, SRV,  CAA)"},"value":{"type":"string","description":"记录值 "},"ttl":{"type":"integer","description":"缓存时间(秒)"},"domain":{"type":"string","description":"域名 国际化域名Punycode编码后提交"},"priority":{"type":"integer","description":"优先级 uint16 SRV与MX类型可用"}},"required":["name","type","ttl","value","domain"]}

list.title: 获取单条资源记录
list.desc:
curl --location --request GET '{dns_api_host}/resource-record/609e2e53128ed1de2c981005'

{
    "code": 0,
    "msg": "成功",
    "data": {
        "id": "609e2e53128ed1de2c981005",
        "domain": "vw.xyz",
        "name": "@",
        "type": "SRV",
        "value": {
            "weight": 1,
            "port": 5000,
            "target": "baidu.com"
        },
        "value_view": "0 1 5000 baidu.com",
        "ttl": 60,
        "priority": 0,
        "created_at": 1620979283,
        "updated_at": 1620979283
    }
}

list.title: 获取资源记录列表
list.desc:
curl --location --request GET '{dns-api-host}/resource-records?page_num=1&page_size=20&domain=example.com'

{
    "code": 0,
    "msg": "成功",
    "data": {
        "list": [
            {
                "id": "60a22fdae65f30eeb2c497a7",
                "domain": "example.com",
                "name": "@",
                "type": "A",
                "value": "8.8.8.8",
                "value_view": "8.8.8.8",
                "ttl": 60,
                "priority": 0,
                "created_at": 1621241818,
                "updated_at": 1621241818
            },
            {
                "id": "609e2e53128ed1de2c981005",
                "domain": "example.com",
                "name": "@",
                "type": "SRV",
                "value": {
                    "weight": 1,
                    "port": 5000,
                    "target": "baidu.com"
                },
                "value_view": "0 1 5000 server.example.com",
                "ttl": 60,
                "priority": 0,
                "created_at": 1620979283,
                "updated_at": 1620979283
            }
        ],
        "page": {
            "total_page": 1,
            "current_page": 1,
            "count": 2
        }
    }
}
